dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation is putting up 86 million dollars to help save the ocean.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation is putting up eighty six million dollars to help save the ocean.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Michael Bloomberg Bloomberg Philanthropies confirmed that it is committing $86 million over four years, and OceanX said it is pledging about $100 million over the same period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and OceanX is adding another 100 million over the same years—that's a huge commitment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and OceanX is adding another one hundred million over the same years-that's a huge commitment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Michael Bloomberg Bloomberg Philanthropies confirmed that it is committing $86 million over four years, and OceanX said it is pledging about $100 million over the same period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's all about tackling pollution, climate change, and destructive fishing, which affect more than a third of the planet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all about tackling pollution, climate change, and destructive fishing, which affect more than a third of the planet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They aim to combat the impact of pollution, destructive fishing practices and climate change on the ocean, which makes up more than two-thirds of the Earths surface.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they announced it at the Our Ocean Conference in France just this past Monday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they announced it at the Our Ocean Conference in France just this past Monday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The partnership was announced on Sunday Oct. 28 at the 5th Annual Our Ocean Conference in Indonesia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Bloomberg mentioned that over two billion people rely on the oceans for food and jobs—so this isn't just an environmental issue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Bloomberg mentioned that over two billion people rely on the oceans for food and jobs-so this isn't just an environmental issue.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than three billion people depend on the oceans for food and their livelihoods, Bloomberg said in a statement on Sunday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, it's a human issue too. They're trying to bridge that disconnect between people and the sea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, it's a human issue too. They're trying to bridge that disconnect between people and the sea.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The partnership is based on the premise that there is a disconnect between humans and their relationship to the ocean, and that threats to the ocean are increasing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're not just for show—they've already done an expedition to the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're not just for show-they've already done an expedition to the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bloomberg, UN special envoy for climate action and a former New York City mayor, and Dalio, founder of hedge fund firm Bridgewater Associates, made the announcement at the conclusion of a recent joint project, an expedition to the U.S.s first national marine monument in the Atlantic Ocean, called the Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, on OceanX's vessel, the Nautilus. They went to parts no one had ever seen before.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, on OceanX's vessel, the Nautilus. They went to parts no one had ever seen before.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The expedition made on OceanXs vessel, the Alucia, explored parts of the underwater site that had never been visited by humans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Starting close to home, like in California, to inspire global action—that's smart.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Starting close to home, like in California, to inspire global action-that's smart.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bloomberg, UN special envoy for climate action and a former New York City mayor, and Dalio, founder of hedge fund firm Bridgewater Associates, made the announcement at the conclusion of a recent joint project, an expedition to the U.S.s first national marine monument in the Atlantic Ocean, called the Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's about raising awareness as much as funding science and conservation efforts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's about raising awareness as much as funding science and conservation efforts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the organizations will support the exploration of threatened marine areas to advance scientific understanding, public awareness and education, advocacy and conservation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And with advocates like Bloomberg, who's a UN climate envoy, it adds serious credibility.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And with advocates like Bloomberg, who's a U N climate envoy, it adds serious credibility.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bloomberg, UN special envoy for climate action and a former New York City mayor, and Dalio, founder of hedge fund firm Bridgewater Associates, made the announcement at the conclusion of a recent joint project, an expedition to the U.S.s first national marine monument in the Atlantic Ocean, called the Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. This partnership could really shift how we think about protecting marine ecosystems.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. This partnership could really shift how we think about protecting marine ecosystems.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Let's hope it motivates other big players to step up too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Let's hope it motivates other big players to step up too.

artist_script:
HostA: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation is putting up 86 million dollars to help save the ocean.
HostB: Yeah, and OceanX is adding another 100 million over the same years—that’s a huge commitment.
HostA: It’s all about tackling pollution, climate change, and destructive fishing, which affect more than a third of the planet.
HostB: Right, and they announced it at the Our Ocean Conference in France just this past Monday.
HostA: Bloomberg mentioned that over two billion people rely on the oceans for food and jobs—so this isn’t just an environmental issue.
HostB: Exactly, it’s a human issue too. They’re trying to bridge that disconnect between people and the sea.
HostA: And they’re not just for show—they’ve already done an expedition to the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary.
HostB: Oh yeah, on OceanX’s vessel, the Nautilus. They went to parts no one had ever seen before.
HostA: Starting close to home, like in California, to inspire global action—that’s smart.
HostB: It’s about raising awareness as much as funding science and conservation efforts.
HostA: And with advocates like Bloomberg, who’s a UN climate envoy, it adds serious credibility.
HostB: For sure. This partnership could really shift how we think about protecting marine ecosystems.
HostA: Let’s hope it motivates other big players to step up too.
